Plot: Long after his humiliating defeat at the hands of Earthman Elijah Baley, Keldon Amadiro embarked on a plan to destroy planet Earth. But even after his death, Baley's vision continued to guide his robot partner, R. Daneel Olivaw, who had the wisdom of a great man behind him and an indestructable will to win....
Characters: R. Daneel Olivaw, Keldon Amadiro, Gladia Delmarre, R. Giskard Reventlov
